name: Loopcv
description: Loopcv collects millions of job postings, matches your profile and sends personalised emails every day. We have applied AI and automation techniques to the job hunting process; making the entire process less stressful.

jobs.title: Business Operations Intern
jobs.description:
Loopcv is a new platform matching great people with new jobs posted by companies.

We released our first version a couple of month ago and we grow daily.
For this role we are looking an excited business operation intern to help us grow faster and increase our presence in social media.

The main responsibilities for this remote internship:
✔️Follow the weekly operations of Loopcv and communicate with partners and users
✔️Supports the coordination of the commitments with internal and external organizations to fulfil strategies
✔️Build new relationships with customers and other members of the team within a project environment
✔️Support the team to influence the direction of the projects to ensure the desired aims are achieved
✔️Working collaboratively with third parties to deliver effective change
✔️Manage changing user needs within a project life cycle

If you are interested please send us an email with your cv/linkedin at jobs@loopcv.pro

jobs.title: Business developer - Co founder
jobs.description:
Loopcv is a new platform matching people with new jobs posted by companies in the top platforms.

But Loopcv is not just a matching platform. It is the only  platform which completely automates the job search by taking action. You select your email template, and we send them to the companies you matched with, attaching your cv.

We released our first version a couple of month ago and we grow daily.
For this role we are looking an excited business developer to join us 

The main responsibilities for this role:

✔️Develop a growth strategy focused both on financial gain and customer satisfaction

✔️Conduct research to identify new markets, partnerships and customer needs

✔️ Arrange remote business meetings with prospective clients

✔️ Promote the company’s products/services addressing or predicting clients’ objectives

✔️ Build long-term relationships with new and existing customers

If you are interested please send your cv and your linkedin profile: 
jobs@loopcv.pro

jobs.title: Machine learning engineer - Remote Intern at www.loopcv.pro
jobs.description:
At Loopcv we match job postings with our users. To do so, we use various machine learning tecnhiques

For this role we need a great profile to help us improve our matching capabilities!

Responsibilities include:
--------------------------
✔️Designing and developing machine learning and deep learning systems
✔️Running machine learning tests and experiments
✔️Implementing appropriate ML algorithms
✔️Study and transform data science prototypes
✔️Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
✔️Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods


Requirements
--------------------------
✔️Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
✔️Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
✔️Ability to write robust code in Python 
✔️Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn)
✔️Excellent communication skills
✔️Ability to work in a team


--- This is a non paid position in a new startup. If you are a great member you can continue with salary or/and equity in the business once we get funding next year ----

Still interested?

Send your cv at jobs@loopcv.pro
